[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-shell](./foundation-shell.md) &gt; [AppStyle](./foundation-shell.appstyle.md)

## AppStyle type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AppStyle<T = string> = HasTarget<T> & HasPredicate & {
    styles: ComposableStyles | ComposableStyles[];
};
```
**References:** [HasTarget](./foundation-shell.hastarget.md), [HasPredicate](./foundation-shell.haspredicate.md)

## Example 1

AppStyle definition example.

```ts
export const alerts: AppStyle = {
  targetId: 'layout',
  styles: css`
    foundation-alerts {
      --design-unit: 2.5;
      --stroke-width: 1;
    }

    foundation-alerts::part(filter-button) {
      --design-unit: 4;
    }
  `,
};
```

## Example 2

Optional runtime [AssetPredicate](./foundation-shell.assetpredicate.md) function to determine if the asset should be used.

```ts
export const alerts: AppStyle = {
  targetId: 'layout',
  predicate: (context: AppContext) => context.user.isAdmin(),
  styles: css``,
  ...
}
```
